mapper.select: SELECT a.member_id as memberId, a.road_name as roadName, a.addr_detail as addrDetail, a.zip_code as zipCode, a.is_default as isDefault FROM address as a WHERE a.member_id = #{id} and a.is_default == true

SELECT a.member_id as memberId, a.road_name as roadName, a.addr_detail as addrDetail, a.zip_code as zipCode, a.is_default as isDefault FROM address as a
